title: Kumb Space
content:
1. What is “KUMB”?

Kumb is a decentralized, autonomous project developed by community dissidents on the mainstream market and the Kumb team, followed entirely by community driven, based on a token issued on the BSC chain. Kumb is a phenomenon that accidentally broke monopolies and redivided wealth, a token that truly belongs to the masses.
{:height=”10” width=”10”}

2. How is “Kumb” assigned?

The total number of Kumb tokens will be (xxxxx%), which will be distributed in a 100% fair way. The Kumb development team will not reserve any single token, nor will there be any so-called investors or early participants.

3. On the future of “Kumb”

  • Q1: Completed the development of the main functions of KUMB and launched it.
  • Q2: fair start, seeking partnerships with listed exchanges: CoinMarket-Cap, Coingecko, Blockfolio
  • Q3: Listed on centralized exchanges, including MXC, Hotbit, Kucoin…
  • Q4: Optimized and launched the Kumb Dex platform.

4. Buy Now
